widgets
Class MTGraphPlotter

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.components.MTComponent
      widgets.AbstractGUIWidget
          widgets.MTGraphPlotter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
StdMTGraphPlotter
public abstract class MTGraphPlotter
extends AbstractGUIWidget

This class represents a graph plotter, which can plot double-values. It maintains the values it plots and gives you control over your plots.

Version:
20110523
Author:
langenhagen

addValueAt

public abstract void addValueAt(double value,
                                int pos)
Inserts a new data-element to the given position in the list. If the position is not within the range of the data-values-list, the new value will be appended to the end of the list.

Parameters:
value - The value to insert as a double
pos - The position to add the value as an int

getValueAt

public abstract double getValueAt(int pos)
Retrieves the value of the data-element at the given position in the list. If the argument is invalid, NaN will be returned.

Parameters:
pos - The index from where the value to get as an int
Returns:
A double or Double.NaN in case of error

removeValueAt

public abstract double removeValueAt(int pos)
Removes a data-element at the given position in the list. If the position is not within the range of the data-values-list, nothing happens.

Parameters:
pos - The index wich corresponds to the value to be deleted int
Returns:
The deleted value as a double or Double.NaN in case of error
